data.title: Beacon VC Accelerates Sustainable Innovation with US$13 Million Investment Portfolio
data.description: Beacon Venture Capital Company Limited (Beacon VC), a venture capital firm backed by KASIKORNBANK, is accelerating its mission to foster sustainable innovation in Southeast Asia.

data.title: Russia eyes increasing cooperation with Thailand under BRICS
data.description: Russian ambassador outlines opportunities for closer collaboration and trade in several sectors including energy

data.title: Six arrested over call centre scams in southern Thailand
data.description: Police arrested six people allegedly involved in call centre scams and the illegal firearms trade, the Cyber Crime Investigation Bureau (CCIB) announced yesterday, saying the suspects may have also financed the insurgency in the deep South.

data.title: Government’s rice export policy ‘selling a dream’, experts say
data.description: Thai Rice Exporters Association points out that only the high fees for documentation prevent farmers and SMEs from exporting their rice

data.title: Hygiene stressed amid Norovirus outbreak in China
data.description: The Norovirus outbreak has affected multiple areas in China, with infections spreading since October. While everyone is generally susceptible to the virus, many school students have been impacted, including three classes at Zhejiang Road Primary School , where lessons have shifted online.

data.title: A seat at the table – young people in Thailand call for a bigger role in climate action
data.description: Youth advocates today submitted climate action recommendations to the Royal Thai Government. The recommendations drew on a national Suan Dusit Poll of nearly 1,000 children and young people across Thailand, followed by one-to-one discussions between UNICEF and young representatives.

data.title: A seat at the table – young people in Thailand call for a bigger role in climate action
data.description: Youth advocates today submitted climate action recommendations to the Royal Thai Government. The recommendations drew on a national Suan Dusit Poll of nearly 1,000 children and young people across Thailand, followed by one-to-one discussions between UNICEF and young representatives.

data.title: Businesses join UNESCO and Ministry of Education to boost green education
data.description: On a warm morning at Banna District Learning Encouragement Center, Nakhon Nayok, a group of students and community residents gathered under their newly installed solar-powered rooftop.

data.title: Attempts to crack credentials continue to assault businesses in SEA
data.description: Global cybersecurity company Kaspersky reports blocking more than 23M bruteforce attacks eyeing businesses in Southeast Asia (SEA) for the first six months of 2024.

data.title: Mercer reveals average salary in Thailand is set to increase by 5.0% in 2025
data.description: Bangkok, Thailand – 11 December 2024 – Mercer, a global leader in redefining the world of work, reshaping retirement and investment outcomes and unlocking real health and well-being, and a business of Marsh McLennan (NYSE: MMC), today revealed that the average employee salary in Thailand is set to increase by 5.0% in 2025, equivalent to 2024.

data.title: Kaspersky: Attempts to crack credentials continue to assault businesses in SEA
data.description: Global cybersecurity company Kaspersky reports blocking more than 23M bruteforce attacks eyeing businesses in Southeast Asia (SEA) for the first six months of 2024.

data.description: Upon watching the new British spy series Black Doves, one is left with mixed feelings. Here

data.title: Journey to the self with Sundae Kids
data.description: Art lovers are invited to look back on their own lives and answer some questions during "Sundae Kids: 10 Years Of Lost And Found" which is running at RCB Galleria 1, 2nd floor of River City Bangkok, Charoen Krung 24, until Jan 26.

data.title: Six linked to call centre scams
data.description: Police arrested six people allegedly involved in call centre scams and the illegal firearms trade, the Cyber Crime Investigation Bureau (CCIB) announced yesterday, saying the suspects may have also financed the insurgency in the deep South.

data.title: PM touts economic plans
data.description: Prime Minister Paetongtarn Shinawatra has pledged a raft of new populist measures to boost the economy and improve people

data.title: PPRP officially kicks out dissenting MPs
data.description: The Palang Pracharath Party (PPRP) has officially expelled 20 MPs who defected following a dispute between former party secretary-general Capt Thamanat Prompow and present party leader Prawit Wongsuwon.

data.title: Kunlavut eyes SF spot after tough loss
data.description: Kunlavut Vitidsarn will battle Jonatan Christie in the final Group B match on Friday with a place in the men

data.title: Supachok confident in Thailand chances
data.description: Thailand star Supachok Sarachat believes the team can cope with the pressure and expectations at the Asean Mitsubishi Electric Cup 2024.

data.title: Unwrap the magic of the holiday season at The Standard, Bangkok Mahanakhon
data.description: From the stunning Christmas tree on The Parlor terrace to festive indulgences at Tease and the bustling Christmas market, the magic culminates with an unforgettable New Year’s Eve countdown party at Sky Beach. Featuring internationally renowned DJ Alex from Tokyo, the event promises electrifying beats and breathtaking views.

data.title: Vacheron Constantin unveils limited edition patrimony watch
data.description: Vacheron Constantin unveils a new Patrimony self-winding reference in a 100-piece limited edition, marking a continuation of its longstanding collaboration with French designer Ora ïto, a celebrated talent in the “One of Not Many” initiative.

data.title: Celebrate Christmas with RBSO’s “Sound of the Seasons”
data.description: Enjoy a magical festive concert with Dutch conductor Sander Teepen and soprano Jeannette van Schaik, marking 420 years of Thai-Netherlands relations.

data.title: Festive buffets await at Ventisi this December
data.description: This December, immerse yourself in the festive spirit with themed dinner buffets at Ventisi, Centara Grand at CentralWorld. Available from 2-31 December 2024 (excluding Christmas Eve and New Year’s Eve), these exquisite feasts, curated by Executive Chef Andrea Montella and his team, showcase the finest local and imported ingredients paired with timeless cooking techniques.

data.title: Unwrap the festive magic at Moxy Bangkok Ratchaprasong
data.description: Moxy Bangkok Ratchaprasong, nestled in Bangkok’s vibrant shopping district, is ready to kick off an unforgettable festive season with exclusive Christmas and New Year’s Eve celebrations.

data.title: Longines: Gifting timeless elegance this festive season
data.description: As twinkling lights adorn the city and the air fills with celebration, the art of gifting takes centre stage. This year, Longines invites you to embrace the magic of the season with timepieces that tell more than just time – they tell stories of heritage, craftsmanship, and enduring beauty.

data.title: Festive Getaway: Celebrate the season at Courtyard Suvarnabhumi
data.description: Celebrate the holidays with exclusive offers and rewards at Courtyard by Marriott Bangkok Suvarnabhumi Airport.

data.title: Happiness together: ALLY’s festive celebration unveiled
data.description: As the year draws to a close, the ALLY group of shopping malls invites everyone to embrace the holiday spirit with “ALLY Let’s Celebrate Joy Together 2025”, a celebration spanning 11 prime locations across Bangkok. From The Crystal (Ekamai-Ramintra, Ratchapruek, Chaengwattana) to Plearnary Mall, The Scene, Amorini, and more, each venue is transformed into a vibrant space brimming with joy and inspiration.

data.title: Kimpton Maa-Lai Bangkok brings holiday magic to life
data.description: This festive season, Kimpton Maa-Lai Bangkok transforms into Tinseltown, immersing guests in the magic of iconic holiday films. With six unique restaurants and bars embracing the cinematic theme, Langsuan
